footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Skill Talents: Heizou

fields.name: Fudou Style Martial Arts
fields.value:
*Normal Attack*
> **Normal Attack:** Performs up to 5 fisticuffs empowered by a mighty wind, dealing Anemo DMG.
> **Charged attack:** Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and performs a sweeping kick that deals Anemo DMG.
> **Plunging Attack:** Calling upon the surging wind, Heizou plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

fields.name: Heartstopper Strike
fields.value:
*Elemental Skill*
 Tap: Uses one normal-powered Heartstopper Strike and deals Anemo damage
Hold: Charges the Heartstopper Strike and gains the Declension effect while charging, which increases the Strike's power. Unleashes the Strike after charging or when you release the button.
Declension: Increases the power of Heartstopper Strike. Can be stacked four times, and when Heizou has four, he gains the Conviction effect, which further increases the Heartstopper Strike's power and range.

fields.name: Windmuster Kick
fields.value:
*Elemental Burst*
Leaps into the air and delivers an explosive kick that deals Anemo damage in a broad area of effect using the Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger. When the Slugger connects with an opponent afflicted by Pyro, Hydro, Electro, or Cryo, it applies the Windmuster Iris effect.
The Iris will explode after a few seconds and deal additional damage of that element, and it can be applied to up to four opponents at one time.
